issue.title: [JAVA] ValueVector hierarchy (Implementation Phase 2)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1474](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1474). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1474?focusedCommentId=16204754) by Siddharth Teotia (siddteotia):*
A patch with implementation for other scalar types is in progress along with creating their legacy counterparts (mutator/accessor based)

- NullableBigIntVector
- NullableFloat4Vector
- NullableFloat8Vector
- NullableUInt1Vector
- NullableUInt2Vector
- NullableUInt4Vector
- NullableUInt8Vector
- Nullable <all date types> vector

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1474?focusedCommentId=16216145) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Merged into java-vector-refactor branch https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/612b9708658ece27b1ba12ee92a997652beb007b
